R

readGroundTruth(boolean) - Method in class it.unipd.dei.ims.datacitation.groundtruth.GroundTruthBuilder
Read the ground truth and return an hash map with xpaths as keys and machine readable references as values.
recall(String, String) - Static method in class it.unipd.dei.ims.datacitation.evaluation.CalculateMeasure
Calculates the recall of a reference as the number of correct retrieved XPath over the total number of correct XPaths composing the reference.
Reference - Class in it.unipd.dei.ims.datacitation.buildcitation
This class handles the Reference object which contains the human-readable reference and the machine-readable reference.
Reference(String, String) - Constructor for class it.unipd.dei.ims.datacitation.buildcitation.Reference
 
Reference() - Constructor for class it.unipd.dei.ims.datacitation.buildcitation.Reference
 
ReferenceBuilder - Class in it.unipd.dei.ims.datacitation.buildcitation
This class takes the candidate citation paths and builds the final reference both in human- and machine- readable formats (conjunction of XPaths)
ReferenceBuilder(String, String, ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class it.unipd.dei.ims.datacitation.buildcitation.ReferenceBuilder
 
ResultPair - Class in it.unipd.dei.ims.datacitation.citationprocessing
This class provides the object to handle result lists.
